definitions.definition: Molten material, the product of melting .
The transition of matter from a solid state to a liquid state.
The springtime snow runoff in mountain regions.
Rock showing evidence of having been remelted after it originally solidified.
examples: Numerous samples of breccia and impact melts were recovered by drilling into the floor of the crater.

definitions.definition: A wax -based substance for use in an oil burner as an alternative to mixing oils and water.
A centre-left or liberal person, when in opposition to a leftist ; ( especially ) a critic of Jeremy Corbyn within the Labour Party.
Variant spelling of milt , the semen of a male fish, used as food.

main_definition: Molten material, the product of melting .
secondary_definitions: The transition of matter from a solid state to a liquid state.
The springtime snow runoff in mountain regions.
( geology ) Rock showing evidence of having been remelted after it originally solidified.
A wax -based substance for use in an oil burner as an alternative to mixing oils and water.
( UK , politics , slang , derogatory ) A centre-left or liberal person, when in opposition to a leftist ; ( especially ) a critic of Jeremy Corbyn within the Labour Party.
Variant spelling of milt , the semen of a male fish, used as food.
